footer.newsletterDesc: Get the latest recommendations in your inbox

about.metaDescription: Learn more about the Children's Game Guide. We help parents find the best games for their children with a focus on quality, safety and learning.
about.pageSubtitle: Your guide to the best games for children
about.missionText1: The Children's Game Guide was created with one clear mission: To help parents navigate the overwhelming world of children's games. With thousands of apps, computer games and board games on the market, it can be hard to find games that are actually good for your child.
about.missionText2: We review games with a focus on what matters most to parents: Is the game safe? Are there ads or in-app purchases? Does the child learn something? And most importantly - is it fun?
about.digitalGamesDesc: We review apps for tablets and smartphones, computer games and console games. We always test the games ourselves and evaluate content, safety and educational value.
about.boardGamesDesc: We review board games for all ages - from simple games for the youngest to more challenging strategy games for older children.
about.parentFocusDesc: All our reviews include important information for parents: Are there ads? In-app purchases? Data collection? Can it be played offline?
about.ageAdaptedDesc: We categorize all games by age group, so you can easily find games that suit your child's age and development.
about.honestyDesc: We give honest reviews - even when a game doesn't live up to expectations.
about.safetyDesc: Children's safety and privacy is always our highest priority.
about.learningDesc: We highlight games that combine fun with learning.
about.perspectiveDesc: We prioritize Danish apps and games, written in Danish for Danish parents.
about.contactText: We'd love to hear from you! Do you have suggestions for games we should review, or feedback on the site?

contact.metaDescription: Contact the Children's Game Guide. We'd love to hear from you with feedback, suggestions or questions.
contact.pageSubtitle: We'd love to hear from you
contact.introText: Do you have questions, suggestions for games we should review, or feedback on the site? Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.writeToUsText: Do you have suggestions for games we should review? Feedback on the site? Or just a question? We'll respond as quickly as we can.
contact.responseTimeText: We aim to respond within 2-3 business days
contact.tipText: Know a great game we're missing? Send us a tip!
contact.successMessage: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.errorMessage: An error occurred. Please try again.
